title: WAR AND PEACE
description:
From the award-winning translators of Anna Karenina and The Brothers Karamazov comes this magnificent new translation of Tolstoy’s masterwork.

Nominated as one of America’s best-loved novels by PBS’s The Great American Read

title: The World as It Is
description: NEW YORK TIMES BESTSELLER • From one of Barack Obama’s most trusted aides comes a revelatory behind-the-scenes account of his presidency—and how idealism can confront harsh reality and still survive.

title: If I Live to Be 100
description:
ABOUT IF I LIVE TO BE 100
If I Live to Be 100 is a remarkable book, beautifully written and elegantly wise, that takes us inside the world of the very old and invites us to learn from them firsthand the art of living well for an exceptionally long period of time.
